name: v1.4.2-rc1
body:
vsphereveleroplugin/velero-plugin-for-vsphere:v1.4.2-rc1
vsphereveleroplugin/backup-driver:v1.4.2-rc1
vsphereveleroplugin/data-manager-for-plugin:v1.4.2-rc1

## What's Changed
*  Remove health annotation from PVC  #495

name: v1.4.1
body:
# Container Images

- `vsphereveleroplugin/velero-plugin-for-vsphere:v1.4.1`
- `vsphereveleroplugin/backup-driver:v1.4.1`
- `vsphereveleroplugin/data-manager-for-plugin:v1.4.1`

# Velero vSphere Operator CLI
Velero vSphere Operator CLI is required to deploy Velero in vSphere with Tanzu.

# Data Manager OVA
Data Manager OVA is required to deploy Data Manager VM in vSphere with Tanzu. No change since release 1.1.0. 

Download link: https://vsphere-velero-datamgr.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/datamgr-ob-17253392-photon-3-release-1.1.ova

# Change Log
https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/blob/v1.4.1/changelogs/CHANGELOG-1.4.md

name: v1.4.0
body:
# Container Images

- `vsphereveleroplugin/velero-plugin-for-vsphere:v1.4.0`
- `vsphereveleroplugin/backup-driver:v1.4.0`
- `vsphereveleroplugin/data-manager-for-plugin:v1.4.0`

# Features
## CSI Migrated Volume Support
- Bump up astrolabe version to pick up csi migrated volume support ([#442](https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/pull/442), [@liuy1vmware](https://github.com/liuy1vmware))
- Support creating snapshot for migrated CSI volume ([#443](https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/pull/443), [@liuy1vmware](https://github.com/liuy1vmware))

# Velero vSphere Operator CLI
Velero vSphere Operator CLI is required to deploy Velero in vSphere with Tanzu.

Download link: https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/releases/download/v1.4.0/velero-vsphere-1.2.0-linux-amd64.tar.gz

# Data Manager OVA
Data Manager OVA is required to deploy Data Manager VM in vSphere with Tanzu. No change since release 1.1.0. 

Download link: https://vsphere-velero-datamgr.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/datamgr-ob-17253392-photon-3-release-1.1.ova

# Change Log
https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/blob/v1.4.0/changelogs/CHANGELOG-1.4.md

name: v1.1.0
body:
# New Features
* Full backup/restore support for applications running on Guest clusters(TKGS)
* Full backup/restore support for applications running on WCP Supervisor Cluster

# Container Image
`vsphereveleroplugin/velero-plugin-for-vsphere:1.1.0`

# Change Log
https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/blob/v1.1.0/changelogs/CHANGELOG-1.1.md

# Documentation
https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/velero-plugin-for-vsphere/blob/v1.1.0/README.md
